pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 17, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 17, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Holiness, Hazrat Mirza Masroor Ahmad.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


4:10 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ministers Navdeep Bains, Kirsty Duncan, Harjit Sajjan, MÃ©lanie Joly, John McCallum and Carla Qualtrough and Member of Parliament Judy Sgro, will meet with His Holiness, Hazrat Mirza Masroor Ahmad .  

Centre Block, Cabinet Room
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:

613-957-5555
